Class
Description
Aggregation
Maps a single bundle defined in AggregationConfiguration.

Represents the types of aggregation that can be performed.

Maps aggregations from an external JSON formatted config file defined in the option bundleConfiguration.

HelpMojo
Display help information on minify-maven-plugin.
Call mvn minify:help -Ddetail=true -Dgoal=<goal-name> to display parameter details.

A Rhino compatible error reporter.
